scripts.dev: concurrently -n be,fe -c blue,green "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:frontend: cd fyli-fe && npx concurrently -n tsc,srv "npx tsc --watch --preserveWatchOutput" "npx http-server ./src -a localhost -p 8000 -c-1 --cors"
scripts.stop: lsof -ti :5001,:5000,:8000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; echo 'All dev servers stopped'
scripts.restart: npm run stop && npm run dev
